title: The MultiDark Database for cosmological simulations

author: Ginevra Favole, Instituto de Astrofísica de Andalucía - CSIC

segmentation: I'm generally from the Institute of Astrophysical and Delusia in Granada, and on behalf of the Multi Dark AIP collaboration, I would like to talk about the multilateral.
The database is web interface on at multidark.org it contains a lot of documentation and collection of queries and examples.
It is supported in particular by Adam Part and Parcel Anne Christine Ribbon.
And for registered users, there is a private database space.
OK, so data can be accessible through standard SQL queries or scripts in IDL, R and top cap.
OK, the database contains 2 simulation.
Bolshoi with our box size of 250 megaparsec over each cube and multi dark data release one with one giga parsec.
Both contain around 8.5 billion particles and both as a mass resolution that is around.
That is more than six times the mass resolution of Millennium simulation buffer are based on WF5 cosmology.
So the idea is that once the simulation is run, data are called Rd data are collected in snapshots according to the redshift.
Then the auto Finder as to identify self bound structures which are possible location for galaxies.
In this way Alamo more color catalogs are created and they contain all the informations about allows.
I mean to say position, velocity, mass, radius.
ETC and this catalogs can be used to compare with real observation.
So for example, with data from Boston Sloanes.
OK, the last thing.
There are two kinds of hollow finders in the in the database.
The first one is the bounding city maximum, which is an algorithm that detects local density.
Maxima impose a cut off on the hollow and remove some bound particles according to the Overland City Criterium.
We want to choose.
There are two classes of catalogs that we can create the V and the the second kind of auto finders.
Is the Friends of Friends which detects linked particle as those particles which have mutual distances that are less than a given threshold that is called the link in length.
OK, in the database there are also substructures and they're merging trees histories.
So yeah, here is my foster Ann.
Please visit the Multi dark website OK?
